R

RegularPolygon - Class in <Unnamed>
The RegularPolygon class is a subclass of Shape which helps us to create a general polygon
RegularPolygon(int, double) - Constructor for class RegularPolygon
This constructor helps in building a regular polygon with n sides and r radius
RegularPolygon(int) - Constructor for class RegularPolygon
This constructor helps in building a regular polygon with n sides of radius 1.0
RegularPolygon() - Constructor for class RegularPolygon
This constructor helps in building a regular polygon with 3 sides of radius 1.0
RegularPolygonTester - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is a tester class which is being used to test the working of the RegularPolygon class by giving sample values to instance variables
RegularPolygonTester() - Constructor for class RegularPolygonTester
 
rotate(double) - Method in class Shape
This method helps in changing the orientation of the concerned shape by angle in radians
